title: The Gathering Afterlights [EP]
description:
This record only has been published as 10" 45rpm vinyl record. I'm one of the 1000 lucky ones to have been able to get it.

I have recorded this to my PC using an Akai ATT05U turntable with a Stanton D680 EEE stylus through a Sound Blaster X-Fi Titanium Fatal1ty Champion. The quality of this recording is very good.

Playlist:
1 - Echoes keep growing  (6:52)
2 - Afterlights  (2:00)
3 - Tuning in, fading out  (3:51)
4 - Meltdown (radio edit)  (4:36)
